alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued September 22 at 7:48PM MDT until September 23 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 33 expected. * WHERE...Arco to Mud Lake region and Aberdeen to Springfield region and to a lesser extent Pocatello, Fort Hall, and Blackfoot. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions can kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain
